sentences.english: The bulk of the railroad workers voted to go back to work.
sentences.chinese: 大多数铁路工人投票义马市窃听器同意规复事变。

sentences.english: The research results have been applied in coal mines of Yima Coal group Co. Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 研究成果在义马耿村煤矿进行了推广应用。

sentences.english: For a while, Li Qin, Li Yi, Ma Wen and Yang Xin get along very well with each other.
sentences.chinese: 一度，李芹李义马文杨欣四个人，是一桌很好的麻将。

sentences.english: Coal spontaneous combustion is one of disaster in Yima coalfield.
sentences.chinese: 煤炭自燃是义马煤田主要灾害之一。
